sentences.sContent: A: Why do we have to do durability test?
sentences.sContent_eng: A: Why do we have to do durability test?
sentences.sCn: 我们为什么要做耐久性测试?

sentences.sContent: Another problem of cigarettes as money is their lack of durability.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another problem of cigarettes as money is their lack of durability.
sentences.sCn: 香烟作为货币的另一个问题是它缺少耐久性。

sentences.sContent: They estimate that they will need between five and ten years to commercialize their technology because uncertainties remain regarding the durability of organic cells.
sentences.sContent_eng: They estimate that they will need between five and ten years to commercialize their technology because uncertainties remain regarding the durability of organic cells.
sentences.sCn: 他们估计要用五到十年的时间使他们的技术商业化，因为关于这种有机电池的耐久性还不确定。

phrases.pCn: 耐久性试验；施工测量；寿命试验；疲劳试验
化学稳定性；化学耐久性
